product_name: Sea to Summit CoolMax Adaptor Traveller Sleeping Bag Liner with Insect Shield
long_description: The Sea to Summit CoolMax(R) Adaptor Traveller Sleeping Bag Liner with Insect Shield(R) has built-in invisible insect protection to repel mosquitoes, ticks, fleas and flies while you sleep. CoolMax polyester provides moisture-wicking, quick-drying comfort and offers the lightweight, softness of cotton. Use the liner as a part of your sleep system or by itself as a warm weather ultralight sleeping bag. Traveller shape is 89 in. long and 36 in. wide, and it includes a pillow pocket for your pillow. Liner helps keep the inside of your sleeping bag clean, saving it from the wear and tear of washings. Contrasting color along the top edge makes it easy to find the opening. Sea to Summit CoolMax Adaptor Traveller Liner with Insect Shield comes with a lightweight Ultra-Sil(TM) stuff sack.
short_description: The Sea to Summit CoolMax(R) Adaptor Traveller Sleeping Bag Liner with Insect Shield(R) has built-in invisible insect protection to repel mosquitoes, ticks, fleas and flies while you sleep.
